message: ...There's no choice. I have to use my power.

I lift my head and start to focus.<k>
...But no. I can't.
If I use my power, the other me will...
In that moment of doubt, Trip closes the distance.

name: ウイルス
message: "What's wrong? You seem distracted. Not sure what to do?"

name: ウイルス
message: "If you take too long to make up your mind..."

name: トリップ
message: "You'll just get the shit beaten out of you."
Trip punches me in the stomach. My knees buckle.
He kicks me in the back and I tumble to the floor.
